content.description: The following table shows data collected about the thirty-third through fortieth presidents of the United States. All variables reported in the table are categorical.
content.question: Name Political Party Eye Color Age at Inauguration Dominant Hand Harry S. Truman Democrat Blue Typical Left Dwight D. Eisenhower Republican Blue Typical Right John F. Kennedy Democrat Blue Typical Right Lyndon B. Johnson Democrat Brown Typical Right Richard Nixon Republican Brown Typical Right Gerald Ford Republican Blue Typical Both Jimmy Carter Democrat Hazel Younger Right Ronald Reagan Republican Blue Older Left Which of the variables in the table could have been reported differently such that the variable would be classified as quantitative?

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe data presented numerically or graphically.
